messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Remove phone number +12453344098 from my contact

Sure—just to confirm, would you like me to delete the entire contact entry that has the phone number +1 245 334 4098?  
If so, please share the contact’s name or ID so I can remove the correct entry.
I don't have the name or ID, just the number.

I can delete the contact for you, but the system needs the contact’s unique ID to make sure the correct entry is removed. If you have that ID (often a short alphanumeric code in the app’s contact list), please share it. 

If you don’t know the ID, you can:
• Check the contact list for the entry with phone +1 245 334 4098—the ID is usually displayed in the contact details.  
• Alternatively, if you remember any other details (name, email, etc.), let me know and I can help narrow it down.
I really don't have any other info, just the number.

I’m sorry, but I can’t remove a contact with just the phone number—our system requires the contact’s unique ID to ensure the correct entry is deleted. 

Please check your contact list or contact details for the ID associated with +1 245 334 4098 and let me know. Once you have that code (it’s usually a short alphanumeric string), I can complete the removal right away.
